item.title: Running Dafny code in a Unikernel
About
item.description: Free software hacker, Unikraft core contribuitor, MsC student at University Politehnica of Bucharest, Researcher at NETSYS Research Group UPB, Undergraduate Teaching Assistant. Contact You can reach me at vlad_andrei.badoiu (at) upb.ro (Research address) badoiu.vlad (at) gmail.com Links NETSYS Research Group UPB Unikraft Project

item.title: Research
item.description: I am a MSc student at University Politehnica of Bucharest. My research interests are operating systems, networking and software security. Publications 2021 FlexOS: Making OS Isolation Flexible H. Lefeuvre, V-A. Bădoiu, S. Teodorescu, T. Mosnoi, C. Raiciu, P. Olivier, R. Deaconescu, F. Huici - in HotOS 2021. Unikraft: Fast, Specialized Unikernels the Easy Way Simon Kuenzer, Vlad-Andrei Bădoiu, Hugo Lefeuvre, Sharan Santhanam, Alex Jung, Gaulthier Gain, Cyril Soldani, Costin Lupu, Stefan Teodorescu, Costi Raducanu, Cristian Banu, Laurent Mathy, Razvan Deaconescu, Costin Raiciu, Felipe Huici - in Eurosys 2021
